interface.name: com.citrix.xenclient.xenmgr.vm
interface.tp:docstring: VM interface. Property access goes through policy checks.

property.name: seamless-id
property.tp:docstring: Handle seamless uses to reference the VMs.

property.name: start-from-suspend-image
property.tp:docstring: Start VM from suspend image file, if it exists.

interface.tp:docstring: One of pv, pvh, or hvm.

property.name: cpuid
property.tp:docstring: Used to set/unset certain bits in response to CPUID instruction.

property.name: xci-cpuid-signature
property.tp:docstring: Advertise to guest as XenClient flavour of Xen.

property.name: kernel-extract
property.tp:docstring: [disk_number,partition_number:]/path/to/kernel Location of kernel image within the VM's disk(s). Examples: /boot/vmlinuz (/boot/vmlinuz in unpartitioned disk 0) 2:/boot/vmlinuz (/boot/vmlinuz in unpartitioned disk 2) 0,1:/boot/vmlinuz (/boot/vmlinuz in 1st partitin of disk 0)

property.name: initrd-extract
property.tp:docstring: [disk_number,partition_number:]/path/to/initrd Location of initrd image within the VM's disk(s). Examples: /boot/inird (/boot/inird in unpartitioned disk 0) 2:/boot/inird (/boot/inird in unpartitioned disk 2) 0,1:/boot/inird (/boot/inird in 1st partitin of disk 0)

property.name: acpi-table
property.tp:docstring: Enable OEM windows install by exposing the ACPI SLIC table.

property.name: qemu-dm-timeout
property.tp:docstring: Timeout (in seconds) to wait for qemu response during qemu startup.

property.name: start-on-boot-priority
property.tp:docstring: Control priority of start-on-boot VMs, higher priority means earlier start. Defaults to 0 for new VMs.

property.name: shutdown-priority
property.tp:docstring: Controls the order of VM shutdown, higher priority means earlier shutdown. For new VMs defaults to 0, or -10 in case of PVM. VMs with the same priority are shutdown in parallel.

property.name: keep-alive
property.tp:docstring: Automatically restart this VM if it shuts down or crashes.

property.name: provides-network-backend
property.tp:docstring: Whether this domain is a networking backend and handles the physical NIC devices.

property.name: provides-default-network-backend
property.tp:docstring: Whether this domain is the primary networking backend and handles the physical NIC devices.

property.name: provides-graphics-fallback
property.tp:docstring: System will keep this VM on screen when no better candidate is present.

property.name: measured
property.tp:docstring: If the VM is measured, the hash of the disk image is checked before it is allowed to start.

property.name: extra-xenvm
property.tp:docstring: Extra xenvm arguments, separated by semicolons.

property.name: extra-hvm
property.tp:docstring: Extra ioemu arguments, separated by semicolons.

property.name: crypto-key-dirs
property.tp:docstring: Comma-separated list of disk encryption keys directories.

property.name: dependencies
property.tp:docstring: VMs that are required to be running before starting this one.

property.name: track-dependencies
property.tp:docstring: If true, automatically start required VMs.

property.name: seamless-mouse-left
property.tp:docstring: Where to move mouse when it goes over the left edge of a surface.

property.name: seamless-mouse-right
property.tp:docstring: Where to move mouse when it goes over right edge of a surface.

property.name: control-platform-power-state
property.tp:docstring: If set, the entire platform will go into S3/S4/S5 when this VM goes into S3/S4/S5.

property.name: oem-acpi-features
property.tp:docstring: Enables access to additional OEM acpi features.

property.name: stubdom
property.tp:docstring: Use stub domain to hide the device emulator.

property.name: usb-enabled
property.tp:docstring: Enables PV USB support.

property.name: usb-auto-passthrough
property.tp:docstring: Enables automatic passthrough of new USB devices to VM currently in focus upon plugging in.

property.name: usb-control
property.tp:docstring: Enables the VM to communicate with the USB daemon.

property.name: usb-grab-devices
property.tp:docstring: Automatically assign all available USB devices upon this VM start.

property.name: greedy-pciback-bind
property.tp:docstring: Bind passthrough pci devices to pciback early, to prevent their use by other VMs.

property.name: policy-modify-vm-settings
property.tp:docstring: Allow modification of VM settings.

property.name: policy-cd-access
property.tp:docstring: Allow VM to read from CD.

property.name: policy-cd-recording
property.tp:docstring: Allow VM to burn CDs.

property.name: policy-audio-access
property.tp:docstring: Allow VM to playback audio.

property.name: policy-audio-recording
property.tp:docstring: Allow VM to record audio.

property.name: policy-wired-networking
property.tp:docstring: Allow VM to access wired network.

property.name: policy-wireless-networking
property.tp:docstring: Allow VM to access wireless network.

property.name: policy-print-screen
property.tp:docstring: Allow VM to use the PrintScreen key.

property.name: run-post-create
property.tp:docstring: Command to run post VM creation.

property.name: run-pre-delete
property.tp:docstring: Command to run pre VM deletion.

property.name: run-pre-boot
property.tp:docstring: Command to run synchronously pre VM boot.

property.name: run-insteadof-start
property.tp:docstring: Command to run instead of VM start

property.name: run-on-state-change
property.tp:docstring: Command to run on VM state change.

property.name: run-on-acpi-state-change
property.tp:docstring: Command to run on VM acpi state change.

property.name: domstore-read-access
property.tp:docstring: Configure domain read access to domstore.

property.name: domstore-write-access
property.tp:docstring: Configure domain write access to domstore.

property.name: show-switcher
property.tp:docstring: Hide/show switcher bar inside VM.

property.name: native-experience
property.tp:docstring: Toggle 'native experience' on/onff.

property.name: wireless-control
property.tp:docstring: Give VM control over wireless stack.

property.name: s3-mode
property.tp:docstring: Configure how the VM is put to sleep.

property.name: s4-mode
property.tp:docstring: Configure how the VM is hibernated.

property.name: vsnd
property.tp:docstring: Use PV audio device.

property.name: vkbd
property.tp:docstring: Use PV keyboard and mouse.

property.name: vfb
property.tp:docstring: Use PV framebuffer.

property.name: argo
property.tp:docstring: Use Argo.

property.name: private-space
property.tp:docstring: Private space used (in MiB).

property.name: realm
property.tp:docstring: Realm ID.

property.name: sync-uuid
property.tp:docstring: VM UUID in synchroniser space.

property.name: icbinn-path
property.tp:docstring: Filesystem path exported to the VM via icbinn server.

property.name: ovf-transport-iso
property.tp:docstring: Transport of OVF configuration via iso enabled yes/no.

property.name: download-progress
property.tp:docstring: VM download progress.

property.name: ready
property.tp:docstring: Is VM ready for use?

property.name: restrict-display-depth
property.tp:docstring: Restrict available display depths. Currently required by emulated VGA in Windows 8.

property.name: restrict-display-res
property.tp:docstring: Restrict available display resolutions.

property.name: preserve-on-reboot
property.tp:docstring: After reboot, keep the vm in rebooted state instead of automatically restarting it

property.name: boot-sentinel
property.tp:docstring: Name of xenstore node to wait on before completing vm startup from toolstack PoV. Useful if VM exports services which need to be immediately usable by other vms

property.name: hpet
property.tp:docstring: HPET support

property.name: timer-mode
property.tp:docstring: Domain timer mode

property.name: nestedhvm
property.tp:docstring: Enable nested virtualization

property.name: serial
property.tp:docstring: Serial port specification

property.name: bios
property.tp:docstring: Bios specification

property.name: hdtype
property.tp:docstring: Hard disk type specification, 'ide' or 'ahci'

method.name: add_disk
method.tp:docstring: Add a new disk to VM.

method.name: list_disks
method.tp:docstring: List the disk objects attached to this VM.

method.name: add_nic
method.tp:docstring: Add a new NIC to the VM.

method.name: list_nics
method.tp:docstring: List the NIC objects attached to the VM.

method.tp:docstring: Remove a VM.

method.tp:docstring: Switch to a VM.

method.tp:docstring: Read a byte array representing the VM icon image.

method.tp:docstring: Start the VM.

method.name: start_internal
method.tp:docstring: Start the VM, for internal use (bypass start hook)

method.name: reboot
method.tp:docstring: Reboot the VM.

method.tp:docstring: Shutdown the VM.

method.name: destroy
method.tp:docstring: Force shutdown the VM.

method.name: sleep
method.tp:docstring: s3 the VM.

method.name: hibernate
method.tp:docstring: s4 the VM.

method.name: resume
method.tp:docstring: Wake the VM from s3.

method.name: pause
method.tp:docstring: Pause VM execution

method.name: unpause
method.tp:docstring: Resume VM execution from paused state

method.name: suspend_to_file
method.tp:docstring: Suspend the VM to disk.

method.name: resume_from_file
method.tp:docstring: Resume the VM from a suspended disk image.

method.name: create_child_service_vm
method.tp:docstring: Create a subordinate Service VM.
